issue.title: false positive nip.io
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard DNS

### AdGuard version

It's dns.adguard-dns.com server

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

nip.io

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

Why did `nip.io` domain get blocked? This is a legitimate service providing free DNS records. Now it resolves all subdomains to all-zero record.

```
; <<>> DiG 9.18.15 <<>> @dns.adguard-dns.com +tls nip.io 10.0.0.1.nip.io. 127.0.0.1.nip.io
; (4 servers found)
;; global options: +cmd
;; Got answer:

;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version: 0, flags:; udp: 0
;; QUESTION SECTION:
;nip.io.				IN	A

;; ANSWER SECTION:
nip.io.			3600	IN	A	0.0.0.0

;; Query time: 156 msec
;; SERVER: 94.140.14.14#853(dns.adguard-dns.com) (TLS)
;; WHEN: Fri Jun 16 10:26:27 +04 2023
;; MSG SIZE  rcvd: 51

;; Got answer:
;; ->>HEADER<<- opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 44614
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version: 0, flags:; udp: 0
;; QUESTION SECTION:
;10.0.0.1.nip.io.		IN	A

;; ANSWER SECTION:
10.0.0.1.nip.io.	3600	IN	A	0.0.0.0

;; Query time: 160 msec
;; SERVER: 94.140.14.14#853(dns.adguard-dns.com) (TLS)
;; WHEN: Fri Jun 16 10:26:27 +04 2023
;; MSG SIZE  rcvd: 60

;; Got answer:
;; ->>HEADER<<- opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 8048
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version: 0, flags:; udp: 0
;; QUESTION SECTION:
;127.0.0.1.nip.io.		IN	A

;; ANSWER SECTION:
127.0.0.1.nip.io.	3600	IN	A	0.0.0.0

;; Query time: 160 msec

```

comment.body:
@AdamWr 
May I shortly ask your knowledge for an opinion here?
https://github.com/hagezi/dns-blocklists/issues/1180

When `ad.71i.de` is blocked (for whatever Ad/Tracking reasons) which is not part of AdGuard DNS filter, it triggers AdBlock screen due AdGuard German filters `||zomap.de^$domain=prosieben.de`

So I have to exclude `ad.71i.de` on DNS or `swankyrule.zomap.de` on cosmetic filtering to get the video fine.

Since the issue is in relation of two different products (if you just use hagezi, everything is fine; if you just use AG, everything is fine), I wonder if there is a better solution for the filterlist than adjusting the custom user rules.

comment.body:
As far as I can see, we have few exceptions for `ad.71i.de`, so I guess that blocking it on DNS level may breaks some websites.
Regarding this case, could you please check out this rule:
```adblock
||oasis-player-prod.p7s1.io/web/*/monetization/monetization.js$replace=/enableAdProxy:!!./enableAdProxy:!1/
```
Clearing cache or refreshing website using <kbd>Ctrl</kbd>+<kbd>F5</kbd> might be required.
